remarks:
A mixed syllogism inference from an implication and a biconditional. Useful for substituting a consequent with a definition.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-1993.)

 A mixed syllogism inference from an implication and a biconditional. Useful for substituting a consequent with a definition.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
sylibr.1 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
sylibr.2 $e |- ( ch <-> ps ) $.
sylibr $p |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
